movies.title: Discount
movies.plot: The news causes consternation among the checkout assistants at Discount's, the local supermarket run by Sofia Benhaoui. Not only do they risk being made redundant due to the installation of automatic pay stations but they are also put in competition to determine who will stay who will be fired. The situation is intolerable, which drives several cashiers to react. But what to do?... After a heated debate, Christine (who has economic difficulties), Alfred (the oldest of the group and the most likely to be laid off), Emma (a single mother) and Momo (a young French Arab) agree to their co-worker Gilles'proposal: to steal goods from the supermarket and sell them at a low price in a social grocery of their own.

biography.bio: Olivier Barthelemy is known for his work on Sheitan (2006), Notre jour viendra (2010) and Largo Winch II (2011).
biography.name: Olivier Barthelemy

biography.bio: Corinne Masiero is an actress, known for Rust and Bone (2012), Louise Wimmer (2011) and The Dreamlife of Angels (1998).
biography.name: Corinne Masiero

biography.bio: Pascal Demolon is an actor and director, known for Dobermann (1997), Il y a longtemps que je t'aime (2008) and Land and Freedom (1995).
biography.name: Pascal Demolon

biography.bio: Sarah Suco is an actress and writer, known for La belle saison (2015), Les figures (2009) and Joséphine s'arrondit (2016).
biography.name: Sarah Suco

biography.bio: M'Barek Belkouk is an actor, known for La marche (2013), Discount (2014) and Les profs (2013).
biography.name: M'Barek Belkouk

biography.bio: Pablo Pauly is an actor, known for Patients (2016), De toutes nos forces (2013) and Les aoûtiens (2014).
biography.name: Pablo Pauly

biography.bio: Tanguy Onakoy is an actor, known for Discount (2014), Fracture (2010) and Rattrapage (2017).
biography.name: Tanguy Onakoy

biography.bio: Zabou Breitman was born on October 30, 1959 in Paris, France as Isabelle Breitman. She is an actress and director, known for The First Day of the Rest of Your Life (2008), L'exercice de l'État (2011) and Se souvenir des belles choses (2001). She was previously married to Fabien Chalon.
biography.name: Zabou Breitman

biography.bio: Born in Palermo, where he lived in the ZEN neighborhood, he debuts as the star in 2002 with the film "Respiro", directed by Emanuele Crialese, where "Pasquale", son of the characters played by Valeria Golino and Vincenzo Amato. In 2006, he returns on large Italian screens, even starring in the role of "Angelo Mancuso", with "Nuovomondo", also directed by Crialese, and "Il fantasma di Corleone", directed by Marco Amenta, 2004's, when it was released in preview in France. On television debut in 2004 with the TV miniseries "Paolo Borsellino", directed by Gianluca Maria Tavarelli and transmitted by Channel 5, the network on which reappears in 2007 with "Il capo dei capi", miniseries in six episodes directed by Enzo Monteleone and Alexis Sweet. In 2008, back in theaters with movies "Il mattino ha l'oro in bocca", directed by Francesco Patierno, film inspired by the autobiography of Marco Baldini, "Il giocatore (ogni scommessa è debito)", and "La siciliana ribelle", directed by Marco Amenta.
biography.name: Francesco Casisa

biography.bio: Hafid F. Benamar is an actor and writer, known for Seuls Two (2008), Platane (2011) and OSS 117: Cairo, Nest of Spies (2006).
biography.name: Hafid F. Benamar

biography.bio: Ethan Deschepper is an actor, known for Discount (2014).
biography.name: Ethan Deschepper

biography.bio: Yves Verhoeven was born on October 27, 1961 in Ferrières-en-Bray, Seine-Maritime, France. He is an actor, known for A Secret (2007), Look at Me (2004) and La classe de neige (1998).
biography.name: Yves Verhoeven

biography.bio: Jean Bediebe is an actor, known for Chocolat (1988), Bienvenue à Marly-Gomont (2016) and Kirikou et les bêtes sauvages (2005).
biography.name: Jean Bediebe

biography.bio: Romain Limpens is an actor, known for Discount (2014), Les trois frères, le retour (2014) and Amour sur place ou à emporter (2014).
biography.name: Romain Limpens

biography.bio: Fattouma Ousliha Bouamari is an actress, known for Munich (2005), Barakat! (2006) and The Other Shore (1997).
biography.name: Fattouma Ousliha Bouamari

camera: Arri Alexa Plus, Zeiss Super Speed and Angenieux HR Lenses
